guidelines: When you have a question, write it down, then allow your wiser self to write an answer.
Share not just from your head but from your heart, and make clear agreements with others.
Honor your need for privacy, but take small risks in revealing your feelings.
Trust your own intuition and instincts; you are the expert on your body and your life.
questions: When making a decision, ask yourself, “If I knew the answer, what would it be?”

advice: Spend time in nature to recharge
Engage in physical activities to build self-trust
View illness as a learning experience rather than a betrayal
negative: Can overthink exercise rather than engage in it
May see illness as a betrayal by the body
positive: Deep connection with the natural world

opportunities: Achieve success in careers that allow for solitude and concentration

advice: Balance need for intimacy with need for solitude
Open up gradually and build trust
Seek partners who respect their need for space
negative: Can be closed off or overly sharing
positive: Desire companionship and a sense of completion
Capable of deep intimacy and vulnerability when trust is established

advice: Choose careers that allow for solitude and concentration
Balance inner work with outer success
negative: May prioritize inner work over career
Can be cynical and distrustful in business
Prefer solitude to the company of others
positive: Can be successful in various fields
Sharp intellect and focus lead to accomplishment
